level.heading: Manner of keeping books, records, accounts, and vouchers.
level.text: Every domestic company shall keep its books, records, accounts, and vouchers in such manner that its financial condition can be ascertained and so that its financial statements filed with the Commissioner can be readily verified.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Hospital and medical services corporations, applicability of this section, see § 31-3503.
Managing general agents, retention of contract records, see § 31-1503.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 31-1503 and § 31-3503.
